description: Starts a request for the descriptive bot builder to generate a bot locale configuration based on the prompt you provide it. After you make this call, use the DescribeBotResourceGeneration operation to check on the status of the generation and for the generatedBotLocaleUrl when the generation is complete. Use that value to retrieve the Amazon S3 object containing the bot locale configuration. You can then modify and import this configuration.

parameters.name: generationInputPrompt
parameters.description: The prompt to generate intents and slot types for the bot locale. Your description should be both detailed and precise to help generate appropriate and sufficient intents for your bot. Include a list of actions to improve the intent creation process.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot for which to generate intents and slot types.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot for which to generate intents and slot types.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The locale of the bot for which to generate intents and slot types.

nested_items.name: generationInputPrompt
nested_items.description: The prompt that was used generate intents and slot types for the bot locale.

nested_items.name: generationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the generation request.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: generationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the generation request.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the generation request was made.
